properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:17AM MST until February 12 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected.
Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting
as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind
chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero.

* WHERE...McCone, Richland, Dawson, Prairie and Wibaux Counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM MST this
morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening
to 11 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind
chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as
30 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds 20 to 30 mph this morning will
create areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY
